metadata.description: Foundation Words Part 6 - Enhanced with Engagement Features
metadata.pedagogical_focus: Colors, shapes, and creative action words with full engagement support
metadata.builds_on: Chunks 1-5 foundation patterns, adding creative vocabulary

words.meaning_support: Shaped like a circle or ball, with no corners
words.context_introduction: A perfect shape like the sun or a wheel, smooth with no sharp edges. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya found a ROUND pebble that fit perfectly in the palm of her hand!
words.visual_context: ‚≠ï Shaped like a circle with no corners
words.personal_connection_question: What round things do you like to roll or spin?
words.story_connection: ROUND magical stones often have special powers in adventure stories!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! ROUND has the 'ou' diphthong - two vowels working together!

words.meaning_support: A shape with four equal sides and four corners
words.context_introduction: A shape with four equal sides that make perfect corners, like a window. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam drew a perfect SQUARE in the sand using a stick as his ruler!
words.personal_connection_question: Can you find square shapes around you right now?
words.story_connection: SQUARE windows and doors often lead to new discoveries!
words.celebration_message: Great job! SQUARE starts with 'squ' - a special three-letter blend!

words.meaning_support: The darkest color, like a moonless night sky
words.context_introduction: The deepest, darkest color like a starry night sky or rich soil. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The sleek BLACK cat silently crossed the moonlit garden path!
words.personal_connection_question: What black things in nature do you think are beautiful?
words.story_connection: BLACK cats and ravens often bring magical messages in stories!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! BLACK starts with 'bl' blend and ends with 'ck' sound!

words.meaning_support: The lightest color, like fresh snow or fluffy clouds
words.context_introduction: The purest, lightest color like fresh snow or cotton clouds. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya gasped at the beautiful WHITE swan gliding across the peaceful lake!
words.personal_connection_question: What white things make you feel peaceful or happy?
words.story_connection: WHITE animals often have magical powers in fairy tales!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! WHITE starts with 'wh' digraph and has magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: The warm color of chocolate, tree bark, and rich earth
words.context_introduction: A warm, earthy color like chocolate, tree bark, or fertile soil. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The wise BROWN owl perched on the ancient oak tree watching over the forest!
words.visual_context: üü§ Warm color of earth and wood
words.personal_connection_question: What brown things in nature make you feel cozy?
words.story_connection: BROWN bears and wise owls are often helpful guides in adventure stories!
words.celebration_message: Great! BROWN has 'br' blend and 'ow' diphthong working together!

words.meaning_support: The bright, cheerful color of sunshine and buttercups
words.context_introduction: A bright, cheerful color like warm sunshine or golden butter. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The field of YELLOW wildflowers stretched as far as Maya could see!
words.personal_connection_question: Does yellow make you think of happy things? What yellow things do you love?
words.story_connection: YELLOW flowers often mark the path to magical places!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! YELLOW has two syllables: 'yel-low' - clap them out!

words.meaning_support: The royal color you get when you mix red and blue
words.context_introduction: A royal, magical color made by mixing red and blue together. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam picked a beautiful PURPLE flower to add to Maya's nature collection!
words.visual_context: üü£ Royal color mixing red and blue
words.personal_connection_question: Do you think purple is a royal, magical color? What purple things do you notice?
words.story_connection: PURPLE robes and gems often belong to powerful wizards!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! PURPLE ends with 'le' pattern and has 'ur' controlled by 'r'!

words.meaning_support: A soft, gentle color like cherry blossoms or sunset clouds
words.context_introduction: A soft, gentle color like cherry blossoms or the inside of seashells. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The PINK sunset painted the sky with the most beautiful colors Maya had ever seen!
words.personal_connection_question: What pink things in nature do you find most beautiful?
words.story_connection: PINK cherry blossoms often signal the start of magical spring adventures!
words.celebration_message: Great job! PINK ends with the 'nk' blend - feel your tongue touch the roof!

words.meaning_support: The color between black and white, like storm clouds or stone
words.context_introduction: The color between black and white, like storm clouds or smooth stones. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The GRAY clouds promised rain for the thirsty garden below!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like gray rainy days or prefer bright sunny ones?
words.story_connection: GRAY storm clouds often bring exciting weather adventures!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! GRAY has 'gr' blend and 'ay' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: The strongest, warmest feeling of caring deeply about someone
words.context_introduction: The strongest, warmest feeling of caring deeply about people and things that matter. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya felt deep LOVE for the forest and all the creatures living there!
words.personal_connection_question: Who or what do you love most in the world?
words.story_connection: LOVE motivates heroes to be brave and protect what matters!
words.celebration_message: Beautiful! LOVE has magic 'e' making that long 'o' sound!

words.meaning_support: To receive or obtain something you want or need
words.context_introduction: When you receive or obtain something you've been hoping for. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya was excited to GET a closer look at the rare butterfly!
words.personal_connection_question: What's something you're hoping to get or achieve?
words.story_connection: Characters often GET magical items that help them on quests!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! GET is a classic consonant-vowel-consonant word!

words.meaning_support: To place something carefully in a specific spot
words.context_introduction: When you place something carefully in exactly the right spot. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam decided to PUT the injured bird gently in a safe, cozy nest!
words.visual_context: üìç To place something in a spot
words.personal_connection_question: Where do you like to put your special treasures to keep them safe?
words.story_connection: Characters PUT magical items in safe places during adventures!
words.celebration_message: Great! PUT has that short 'u' sound in the middle!

words.meaning_support: To divide something using scissors or a safe tool
words.context_introduction: When you carefully divide something using scissors or another safe tool. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya used her craft scissors to CUT beautiful leaf shapes from colorful paper!
words.personal_connection_question: What do you like to cut and create with safe scissors?
words.story_connection: Characters CUT through vines and ropes during jungle adventures!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! CUT follows that same short 'u' pattern as PUT!

words.meaning_support: To make pictures and designs with pencils, crayons, or markers
words.context_introduction: When you create beautiful pictures using pencils, crayons, or your imagination. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya loved to DRAW detailed maps of all the secret places she discovered!
words.personal_connection_question: What do you like to draw? Do you prefer realistic pictures or imaginative ones?
words.story_connection: Characters DRAW maps and clues to remember their adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! DRAW starts with 'dr' blend and has 'aw' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: To make letters and words to share your thoughts and stories
words.context_introduction: When you create letters and words to share your thoughts and amazing stories. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam decided to WRITE a detailed journal about their forest discoveries!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like to write stories, make lists, or write letters to friends?
words.story_connection: Characters WRITE secret messages and keep adventure journals!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! WRITE has silent 'w' and magic 'e' - tricky but you got it!

words.meaning_support: To look at words and understand the stories and ideas they contain
words.context_introduction: When you look at words and discover the amazing stories and ideas inside them. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya loved to READ adventure books under her favorite climbing tree!
words.personal_connection_question: What kinds of books and stories do you like to read most?
words.story_connection: Characters READ ancient maps and magical books to solve mysteries!
words.celebration_message: Great job! READ has 'ea' vowel team making the long 'e' sound!

words.meaning_support: To share your thoughts and ideas out loud with others
words.context_introduction: When you share your thoughts and ideas out loud with people you care about. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya and Sam loved to TALK about their dreams and future adventures!
words.personal_connection_question: Who do you most like to talk with about your ideas and feelings?
words.story_connection: When characters TALK to animals, magical things happen!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! TALK has silent 'l' - you say it but don't hear the 'l'!

words.meaning_support: To share information or exciting stories with someone special
words.context_introduction: When you share important information or exciting stories with someone who listens. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam couldn't wait to TELL his grandmother about the magical garden they found!
words.personal_connection_question: What's the most exciting story you want to tell someone?
words.story_connection: Characters TELL each other secrets that lead to amazing discoveries!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! TELL has double 'l' making one strong sound!

words.meaning_support: To make beautiful music with your voice
words.context_introduction: When you make beautiful music with your voice, like birds do at sunrise. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya loved to SING along with the cheerful birds in the morning!
words.visual_context: üéµ To make music with your voice
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like to sing? Do you sing when you're happy or to comfort yourself?
words.story_connection: Characters who SING often have magical voices that help others!
words.celebration_message: Great! SING ends with 'ng' blend - hum that sound!

words.meaning_support: To move your body to music in joyful, creative ways
words.context_introduction: When you move your body to music in joyful, creative ways that make you smile. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The autumn leaves seemed to DANCE in the gentle wind as Maya watched from her window!
words.visual_context: üíÉ To move your body to music
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like to dance? Do you dance when no one is watching or with friends?
words.story_connection: Characters who DANCE often bring joy and magic to their communities!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! DANCE has magic 'e' that affects how you say the 'a'!
